Rats and roach infested place disgusting 🤮 slice wont recommend for any person
not enough sauce on my pizza
Rats everywhere in that place . I don't know how they are still in business. !! Health department should pay them a visit and close this hole for good .
Good pizza. Served quick. Best jumbo pizza in Admo imo

We stopped in here after watching YouTube video of good food stops in Washington dc. Pizza was fresh off the oven after we ordered and it was delicious. We tried the cheese, meatlovers, and margarita pizza. All we would give 5 stars. Places was easy to find, it was warm the day we went inside but seating available outside.
I ordered a pepperoni jumbo slice. I was given an old dryed pizza reheated. HORRIBLE QUALITY! I will not buy again if not freshly prepared.
Taste ok going in .. but 30min later we was sick using the bathroom smh .. they also need to start wearing gloves and mask !!!!

This is the famous one and only original Jumbo Slice Pizza in D.C. that one should go to for the best slice of Pizza there is in the city. Extremely kind and hardworking owner and employees. The most delicious filling Pizza ever! My all time favorite.
Best place to get jumbo sliced pizza and for a great price.
One of the best jumbo pizza.
I literally go here 3-7 times a week (sometimes 8?) I live in AdMo and this is the best Jumbo Slice on 18th Street. I've tried them all and this one is by far the best.
The best pizza I have ever had. Highly recommend to get to pizza mart  after a crazy night in Adams Morgan..
Best pizza I have had in DC area. Customer service is the best! The owner speaks in multiple languages. Try it!

Decent tasting slice of pizza for cheap did I mention these slices are absolutely huge! Definitely some you can split with a friend or two this is also very transit accessible they also have clean bathrooms that are open and require no keys
(Translated by Google) Very good pizzas and low prices.  (Original) Très bonnes pizzas et prix peu élevés.
That jumbo slice tho!!
Slices tasted great.
It's not the rawest pizza I've ever had. His the drunk spot

THEY STOLE MY VISA GIFT CARD. went there last night and they gave me the wrong card back (which has $0 on it) and I didn’t realize it until today. Still had about $60 on it. These are some shady people and I would never go there if I were you.

I decided to eat here because it was featured on tv. Be warned that depending on which side you approach it from theres another pizza mart that looks almost like this. I almost walked into the wrong one but I double checked google maps to be sure and it turns out i was about to walk into the wrong one. The place was empty when I went but people slowly started coming in. The jumbo slice pizza was ready in a few minutes and was huge. The pizza tasted average but it was good. I wasn't able to finish the whole slice so i took the rest home.
Best pizza on my trip to DC
A premier DC food experience
Friendly staff. Large slices. A lil greasy.
Delicious and huge slices
Good  taste crust could have b.c. e been a little thicker and cooked longer
Like Domino’s pizza before they changed their recipe. Garbage

Edible ... Place had 2 little tables and a few chairs along the wall, so not somewhere you take a group to sit and eat. The ambiance is what I would describe as "post apocalyptic" ..rather dirty, run down and depressing.
A grand piece of pie.
A staple in Adam's Morgan. You can't go wrong
Big cheap pizza, who knows when it was made, just warmed up who knows how many times. Place looks like it could be infested with roaches and rats.
Jumbo slice!
Omg this was the best pizza I have had in years
AWESOME! Had a "SPECIALTY SLICE" supreme, and it was delicious. All fresh ingredients, done in no time at all. This is a must visit after being out on U st. all night lol
Use a paper plate, not a full blown pizza box. Pizza was great.
Pizza was okay I guess, for that 2AM after a night of dancing and libations. The roach crawling on the side counters and wall were a different story! 🤮
It's really a jumbo slide. It's my new favorite pizza
Cheese was clumpy on my sons slice and that was his 1st time eating pizza there.The biggest Slice he ever had.He enjoyed it but was complaining about the cheese falling off )-:
The Pizza is always good

Pizza was XL and tasted ok.  The staff was friendly enough.  Not sure why, but it was really warm inside the restaurant- at least 80°.  We ended up ordering get 3 jumbo slices and 3 sodas.  Had the experience for the kiddos & that was worth it.  Next time we will look for the best-tasting pizza in DC :-)
Pizza was okay.
Big and delicious!

Saw this place on TV once and said... Lemme give it a try. I went and i was blown away on how cool the place was... Service was great, pizza although it can be perfect for date night, pure deliciousness. If you are new to D.C., please come to this place you will feel like you're right at home.
Good but 7.99 for one slice pizza is too pricey !!!
The best slices in Adams Morgan
Omg this is the best jumbo slice in DC so far
(Translated by Google) I love pizza because it does not have much fat I recommend it  (Original) Me encantoo la pizza porq no tiene mucha grasa la recomiendo

(First time here, the taste was great and the slice was HUGE) Pineapple & spinach wasn’t on the menu but the kind men behind the counter said they’d make whatever I requested. I will definitely be back!
Awesome face size slices
This is the best pizza ever
Italian calzone recomended
Great slice of pizza

I was in complete disbelief at how very rude and unprofessional the gentleman who was at the counter was. I asked about an item that was not sold at the establishment and he responded, " soup, in a pizza place?" as opposed to simply saying no. In addition to the rude and arrogant cashier, it was colder in the box size restaurant than it was outside and it was barely 40 degrees that day. I seldom leave reviews but thought it would be important that all patrons know to stay the hell away from this establishment! Go a few doors down, the service and pizza maybe better.  I wish I had. BEWARE ! Note to owner, next time have some form of  heat on in December and have that nasty cashier take a few business etiquette classes. It is patrons who keep your business alive..sorry idk his name.
Ok grew up in PA/NY. If you think this is pizza, I feel so bad for you. Its commercial cheese on commercial rolled out bread. Tops for DC, but wow you cannot eat it if you have ever had real pizza.
Been going here for years and it's great cheap pizzia where the slices are enormous
Best pizza on the strip.
Mediocre at best. It’s good if you’re drunk.
Slices are HUGE! I suggest the Margarita Pizza!!!! -1 Star because parking is a beast and the restaurant is not really eat-in friendly!
Ratchet
Slice the size of ya head!
Fast service. Great out the oven hot pizza. And customer service was good!
Better cold than hot. I have no idea why
Go here for late night food after bar hopping. Long lines and crowded post midnight.
Been going here for several years now.It has become a family tradition when everyone comes to town. The inside has been slow evolution but remains a great place to visit for the novelty.
Awesome Pizza!! Huge Slices
Good jumbo slice...

I’m a New Yorker so maybe my standards are high, but when I order a slice, I expect it to at least be reheated in an oven, not served cold. Yeah their slices are huge, but I’d much rather two smaller WARM slices for the $6 it set me back, than one large technically pizza slice. The service is non-existent, but at a parlor should be expected. If this was the only place open at 4 am, I’d rather go hungry, but if you venture a couple doors down there is another joint that will offer an actual edible slice.  If I was starving I’d rather fast than eat here. I am ashamed to have eaten here and highly recommend you don’t.
I love this place more than anything in the world

The ORIGINAL jumbo slice (Wikipedia verified) and very good. No need to mess with that Duccini's or Pizza Boli when you've got the Mart. Slices are high quality in terms of flavor but notably less greasy than the two previously mentioned joints. They just did a weird renovation but no worries there, this is still your best bet for a slice in NW DC.

The manager lies all the time. Told cops we said f... her and we walk right by her. Yeah we were a lil loud. The Captials just won a stanley cup. How can you not be happy for the city you live in? Like if she doesnt want rhe buisness just say so. Idk what buisness doesnt like to make money.
Great customer service and pizza and fries taste good too. Well-managed for sure!
Such a wonderful giant slice
The pizza was so good the slice was Huge & I kept eating it.  Def going back.
Best place to get a slice especially late nite
Huge slices, huge quality.

Pizza Mart is everything I wanted it to be, and more. First we should clarify, you are not buying a slice, you are buying the equivalent of a small pizza shaped like a slice. Ergo, I advise you share your "slice" with a buddy. We've been here a few times now, usually after drinking and the place is always mobbed albeit accessible. But it was my early weekday trip with my husband and young child that really pushed this place into the 5 star category. One of the owners, his likeness is drawn on a pizza box so I think he's the owner, was making silly faces at my toddler and small talk with me about how precious the small moments with children are. Before I left he  gave me a rather unappetizing piece of cheesecake for my kiddo which she was super excited about. I thought the gesture was just too sweet and with it they have won my loyalty for oversized pizza! I should also mention that the cheesecake was AMAZING, I don't know if it's on the menu or if it was part of his secret stash but I'll be needing more.

I decided to stop by an get a slice of pizza one night and something to drink. First I was told they didn't have what I wanted but after getting what they had i saw an employee giving a customer exactly what I asked for, so basically they sold me anything cause the place was busy and then I ask them how much for a bottle of water and one of the guy said $1.50 but when I handed the guy $2.00 he didn't give me back my change so I asked and he looked at me and smile and said it was $2.00 smh. Worst place to get pizza when it's busy cause basically they are ripping people off and thinking it's funny.

JUMBO JUMBO JUMBO, this slice of pizza lasted me three meals, given I wasn't overly hungry when I got it. This thing is the biggest one I've seen in comparison to the others, and it's only 6 bucks.  Totally worth it, soothe your drunk cravings here.
JUMBO slice

Delicious Greasy flavorful goodness. The Jumbo Slice are the size of nearly the typical 12" pizza. This pizza is probably the best of the cheap pizza hands down. I made the mistake of order a salad too. BE smart, and stick to the Za. Pizza Mart needs a motto like WalMart, Eat Pizza. Live Better.
Huge slice of pizza and fresh.
A go to spot when I'm in DC
Called two different numbers. Was uncourteously told they do not deliver and promptly hung up before getting a single breath in. Twice. Avoid.
(Translated by Google) Pizza 🍕 yum  (Original) Pizza 🍕 miam
Hey, we aren't talking gourmet pizza here but if your looking for good, fast and tasty pizza... Jumbo slices the size of most medium pizzas for $6.00 Then look no further.
If you are in DC and if you miss this pizza then your trip is incomplete~ best pizza in town 😍

I visited this no-frills pizza joint just for the novel experience to eat a giant slice of pizza as long as my forearm. And actually, it tasted better than I expected. It's not gourmet, to be sure, but it certainly hits the spot when you are jonesing for pizza, and a lot of it.
Loved the Jumbo slice!!! I came for the potatoes, but I still paid and didn't say a word, this guys are awesome!!!!  #1 DESTINATION FOR MY ROAD TRIP NEXT YEAR!!! KEEP ON KEEPING ON!!!!

Massive slice of pizza for the price! The pizza comes out hot and fresh and the staff is really friendly. The flavors are really simple and crust is thin but holds everything together well. Even if your not sure about the place, the price is so low it's worth trying one slice.

Fresh, hot pizza served by a friendly staff -  After a night of music and socializing, this was the perfect finish.  Thanks to Mike and staff for a wonderful Adams Morgan experience.  This is the best pizza in D.C.
I love this place...

It is what it is- bad pizza, huge portions.  But bad pizza is like sex, even when it's bad it's better than not having sex. Bad anything can be enhanced by being drunk, which is why this place is still in business. For a better jumbo slice, walk south to Duccini's on Florida and 18th
Best pizza you will ever have
If you are hungry and want to fill up on one slice of pizza this is the place to go. Add enough Parmesan cheese and red pepper and whatever you feel is lacking will disappear.

We stopped by here to see if this was the same place the Dugger family went to.  We have 5 kids and we wanted to enjoy some great pizza.  I got hustled and lied to by the manager.  I was so disgusted by his bragging and prodding that I just finally walked out with my family, with him calling out behind me.  So awful!  We went down to Boli's and had an AWESOME experience.
Delicious !!!!!
Great place! Fresh quality!
